name: Burger Clicker (Pillow Sammich)
description:
Burger Clicker is a simple clicker / idle game with handmade Microsoft Paint art!

you click the burger to increase the number, number goes up brain gets happy :)

Buy one of 4 unique buildings to make burgers for you, stack as many as you can and watch the burgers roll in!!!!

The game autosaves once every minute

MUSIC: Guitar & Saxophone (Instrumental) by Aussens@iter (c) copyright 2018 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/tobias_weber/57935 Ft: Stefsax
